title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 68 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 68 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Let God arise, let his enemies be scattered: let them also that hate him flee before him.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗歌，交与伶长）愿神兴起，使他的仇敌四散，叫那恨他的人，从他面前逃跑。

lineList.en: As smoke is driven away, so drive them away: as wax melteth before the fire, so let the wicked perish at the presence of God.
lineList.cn: 他们被躯逐，如烟被风吹散。恶人见神之面而消灭，如腊被火熔化。

lineList.en: But let the righteous be glad; let them rejoice before God: yea, let them exceedingly rejoice.
lineList.cn: 惟有义人必然欢喜，在神面前高兴快乐。

lineList.en: Sing unto God, sing praises to his name: extol him that rideth upon the heavens by his name JAH, and rejoice before him.
lineList.cn: 你们当向神唱诗，歌颂他的名。为那坐车行过旷野的，修平大路。他的名是耶和华。要在他面前欢乐。

lineList.en: A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows, is God in his holy habitation.
lineList.cn: 神在他的圣所作孤儿的父，作寡妇的伸冤者。

lineList.en: God setteth the solitary in families: he bringeth out those which are bound with chains: but the rebellious dwell in a dry land.
lineList.cn: 神叫孤独的有家，使被囚的出来享福。惟有悖逆的住在乾燥之地。

lineList.en: O God, when thou wentest forth before thy people, when thou didst march through the wilderness; Selah:
lineList.cn: 神阿，你曾在你百姓前头出来，在旷野行走。（细拉）

lineList.en: The earth shook, the heavens also dropped at the presence of God: even Sinai itself was moved at the presence of God, the God of Israel.
lineList.cn: 那时地见神的面而震动，天也落雨。西奈山见以色列神的面也震动。

lineList.en: Thou, O God, didst send a plentiful rain, whereby thou didst confirm thine inheritance, when it was weary.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你降下大雨。你产业以色列疲乏的时候，你使他坚固。

lineList.en: Thy congregation hath dwelt therein: thou, O God, hast prepared of thy goodness for the poor.
lineList.cn: 你的会众住在其中。神阿，你的恩惠是为困苦人豫备的。

lineList.en: The Lord gave the word: great was the company of those that published it.
lineList.cn: 主发命令，传好信息的妇女成了大群。

lineList.en: Kings of armies did flee apace: and she that tarried at home divided the spoil.
lineList.cn: 统兵的君王逃跑了，逃跑了。在家等候的妇女，分受所夺的。

lineList.en: Though ye have lien among the pots, yet shall ye be as the wings of a dove covered with silver, and her feathers with yellow gold.
lineList.cn: 你们安卧在洋圈的时候，好像鸽子的翅膀镀白银，翎毛镀黄金一般。

lineList.en: When the Almighty scattered kings in it, it was white as snow in Salmon.
lineList.cn: 全能者在境内赶散列王的时候，势如飘雪在撒们。

lineList.en: The hill of God is as the hill of Bashan; an high hill as the hill of Bashan.
lineList.cn: 巴删山是神的山。巴珊山是多峰多岭的山。

lineList.en: Why leap ye, ye high hills? this is the hill which God desireth to dwell in; yea, the LORD will dwell in it for ever.
lineList.cn: 你们多峰多岭的山哪，为何斜看神所愿居住的山。耶和华必住这山。直到永远。

lineList.en: The chariots of God are twenty thousand, even thousands of angels: the Lord is among them, as in Sinai, in the holy place.
lineList.cn: 神的车辇累万盈千。主在其中，好像在西奈圣山一样。

lineList.en: Thou hast ascended on high, thou hast led captivity captive: thou hast received gifts for men; yea, for the rebellious also, that the LORD God might dwell among them.
lineList.cn: 你已经升上高天，掳掠仇敌，你在人间，就是在悖逆的人间，受了供献，叫耶和华神可以与他们同住。

lineList.en: Blessed be the Lord, who daily loadeth us with benefits, even the God of our salvation. Selah.
lineList.cn: 天天背负我们重担的主，就是拯救我们的神。是应当称颂的。（细拉）

lineList.en: He that is our God is the God of salvation; and unto GOD the Lord belong the issues from death.
lineList.cn: 神是为我们施行诸般救恩的神。人能脱离死亡，是在乎主耶和华。

lineList.en: But God shall wound the head of his enemies, and the hairy scalp of such an one as goeth on still in his trespasses.
lineList.cn: 但神要打破他仇敌的头，就是那常犯罪之人的发顶。

lineList.en: The Lord said, I will bring again from Bashan, I will bring my people again from the depths of the sea:
lineList.cn: 主说，我要使众民从巴珊而归，使他们从深海而回。

lineList.en: That thy foot may be dipped in the blood of thine enemies, and the tongue of thy dogs in the same.
lineList.cn: 使你打碎仇敌，你的脚踹在血中，使你狗的舌头，从其中得分。

lineList.en: They have seen thy goings, O God; even the goings of my God, my King, in the sanctuary.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你是我的神，我的王。人已经看见你行走，进入圣所。

lineList.en: The singers went before, the players on instruments followed after; among them were the damsels playing with timbrels.
lineList.cn: 歌唱的行在前，作乐的随在后，都在击鼓的童女中间。

lineList.en: Bless ye God in the congregations, even the Lord, from the fountain of Israel.
lineList.cn: 从以色列源头而来的，当在各会中称颂主神。

lineList.en: There is little Benjamin with their ruler, the princes of Judah and their council, the princes of Zebulun, and the princes of Naphtali.
lineList.cn: 在那里有统管他们的小便雅悯，有犹大的首领，和他们的群众。有西布伦的首领。有拿弗他利的首领。

lineList.en: Thy God hath commanded thy strength: strengthen, O God, that which thou hast wrought for us.
lineList.cn: 以色列的能力，是神所赐的。神阿，求你坚固你为我们所成全的事。

lineList.en: Because of thy temple at Jerusalem shall kings bring presents unto thee.
lineList.cn: 因你耶路撒冷的殿，列王必带贡物献给你。

lineList.en: Rebuke the company of spearmen, the multitude of the bulls, with the calves of the people, till every one submit himself with pieces of silver: scatter thou the people that delight in war.
lineList.cn: 求你叱喝芦苇中的野兽，和群公牛，并列邦中的牛犊，把银块踹在脚下。神已经赶散好争战的列邦。

lineList.en: Princes shall come out of Egypt; Ethiopia shall soon stretch out her hands unto God.
lineList.cn: 埃及的公侯要出来朝见神。古实人要急忙举手祷告。

lineList.en: Sing unto God, ye kingdoms of the earth; O sing praises unto the Lord; Selah:
lineList.cn: 世上的列国阿，你们要向神歌唱。愿你们歌颂主，

lineList.en: To him that rideth upon the heavens of heavens, which were of old; lo, he doth send out his voice, and that a mighty voice.
lineList.cn: 歌颂那自古驾行在诸天以上的主。他发出声音，是极大的声音。

lineList.en: Ascribe ye strength unto God: his excellency is over Israel, and his strength is in the clouds.
lineList.cn: 你们要将能力归给神。他的威荣在以色列之上，他的能力是在穹苍。

lineList.en: O God, thou art terrible out of thy holy places: the God of Israel is he that giveth strength and power unto his people. Blessed be God.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你从圣所显为可畏。以色列的神，是那将力量权能赐给他白姓的。神是应当称颂的。
